latex: Let $ABC$ be a triangle such that $AB=6,BC=5,AC=7.$ Let the tangents to the circumcircle of $ABC$ at $B$ and $C$ meet at $X.$ Let $Z$ be a point on the circumcircle of $ABC.$ Let $Y$ be the foot of the perpendicular from $X$ to $CZ.$ Let $K$ be the intersection of the circumcircle of $BCY$ with line $AB.$ Given that $Y$ is on the interior of segment $CZ$ and $YZ=3CY,$ compute $AK.$
